alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 4:39PM EDT until June 28 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 439 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Monticello to 7 miles southeast of Madison, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Madison, Greenville, Lee, Dills, Lovett, Hopewell, Aucilla, Cherry Lake, Hamburg, Hanson, Pinetta and Ashville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
